name: Space Shooter (EN4TUN3)
description:
Space Shooter is a game, set in space! In this game, you select your weapons, fight and defend yourself from various enemies and attempt to survive for as long as possible!

This project was made for a Media Design School assignment, and features:

- A fast, repeatable game-play loop.
- Distinct weapons with various characteristics.
- 2 different weapons selected at once, try out all the combinations!
- 3 enemy types with different properties.
- Score counter to track progress.
- High contrast, easy to see visuals.
- Low spec computer friendly!

This SpaceShooter Prototype will be available for free on PC from the 11th of June.
